name: Fighter Dungeon
description:
Fighter Dungeon is a short Google Cardboard carnival game made for a high school statistics project in 2019. The goal of the game is to defeat all three monsters by shooting arrows at them.

To shoot an arrow first load it by looking down, then click on the screen (or use the Google Cardboard button) to fire.

Some parts of the monsters are more vulnerable than others. Hitting these parts deals more damage.
